release.action: Buttons for configuration pages instead of select box.
Statistic configuration available in JMX console.
Refactoring of HTML code for buttons (only one column).
Special button for creating playlists with a single click (available in edit playlist mode).
Statistics as CSV to admin via email.
Store statistics in database: upload/download/login.
Removed feed: for RSS feed URLs.
Better album cover display (alignment, etc.) in album browser.
Removed playlists from Yahoo Media Player. Added track names to Yahoo Media Player display.
Correct content type application/rss+xml for RSS feeds. Added "feed:" to RSS feed URLs.
RSS feeds in HEAD as alternate links (button to add feed in Firefox and Safari for example).
Transcoding parameter (tc) was generated using only ALAC transcoding info for all three types (ALAC, FAAD, LAME).
Always keep sort oder when browsing tracks of a playlist.
Cleanup of server configuration panel (enable/disable elements).
HTTP connector links for playback and download.

Several fixes and improvements for HTTP/HTTPS handling. MyTunesRSS honours proxy settings when sending data to mytunesrss.com. Proxy server protocol (http/https) can be specified (e.g. when using Apache as SSL offloader).
Editable playlist order.
EditPlaylistService: "moveTracks" added.
TrackService: "getTracks" and "search" added. TrackRenderer: added "imageUrl" attribute.
PlaylistService: accept NULL for playlist sort order to have original order and also added a nice error message if the specified order parameter is invalid.
Removed (useless) "map" and "list" elements in JSON RPC responses.
Added transcoding service, LoginService.getUserInfo and LoginService.saveUserSettings.
Fixed servlet filter order.
Genre first characters were not lower case in database.
Added missing GenreRenderer for GenreService method calls.
Remote API function LoginService.ping and ServerService.getServerInfo.
JSON RPC sample application is iPhone optimized now.
Admin notification when a missing file has been requested.

Support for GET requests with BODY parameter in JSON-RPC API calls. Without this we cannot make any use of the JSONP parameter for cross-site-access. The sample application has been changed to use the JSONP parameter and can be started locally by simply opening the "index.html" in a browser.
Number of missing iTunes files in the database update admin notification.
Fixed NullPointerException when getting file type for suffix.
Some JMX related fixes.
Fixed array index out of bounds exception in tc param value evaluation.
JMX server settings in configuration GUI.
Refactoring for TC parameter. More flexible now and handling centralized. Building request scoped web config from session scoped one using the request parameters if available.
Remote API session manager fix (was static, multiple executors were started), now using a servlet context listener.
Remote API improvements, playlist/rss feed creation with transcoding parameters.
Album cover image size configurable (64, 128 and 256).
Reasonable web config defaults for IPhone and PSP.
Debug logging for apple extensions.
Admin email and notifications.
Removed synchronized for "isRunning" method in WebServer to prevent deadlock when starting the server with no users and database update on server start enabled.
Link on the login page to retrieve a forgotten password.
iPhone playlist type modified to really work in iPhone.
More options and sql improvements for random playlist.
Option to use the mytunesrss.com address (default is TRUE) in playlists and for RSS feeds.

URL encode file names on jukebox.jsp to prevent problems with non-web-safe characters. Bugfix for portal page. Version 1.1 of codewave-zis for JDK 1.6 encoding bugfix if entry is not UTF-8 encoded. Do not create folder or file names with leading or trailing dots in ZIP archives.
Use temporary file for transcoder input to prevent problems with non-ASCII characters in files names (which do cause problems with faad on Windows for example).
Embedded quicktime video playback in track info for movie files. No Last.FM scrobbling for movie files.
User email addresses. Mail server configuration. User permission for changing email address.
Support for more tokens in the transcoding binary command lines.
Removed file-suffixes.properties and added a configuration GUI.
Removed transcoder.properties (default and user) file and added command line options to configuration GUI and JMX interface.
Remote API authentication via HTTP header "X-MyTunesRSS-ID" as well (preferred over path info).
Support for optional JSONP parameter.
Folder from iTunes marked with special icons in the web interface and each playlist knows its container if any. Navigation for iTunes folders.

Configuration GUI redesign. Main dialog has no configuration tabs and shows some status information only together with the most important functions (database update/reset, server start/stop and quit). The configuration dialogs are separate modal dialog windows now. This makes it easier to add options to individual settings pages without affection overall layout. Also adding new pages is easier and does not make the number of tabs even bigger. The individual dialogs are resizable and the positions and sizes are saved in the settings which makes the dialogs configuration much better.
Moved xercesImpl into boot class path to prevent rare (OS X specific?) problems when loading the parser implementation classes.
Switched from commons-logging to slf4j. Updated h2 to 1.0.75. Updated Tomcat to 5.5.23.
Fixed apple extensions problem introduced through extracting the extensions framework into its own project.
Checkbox state not correctly handled for "check for update on start" box.
Removed apple extensions from project and created a new standalone project for this. So mytunesrss can be built without any problems on non-apple systems now.
Username and password mandatory in JMX console when adding a user.
Version number not submitted for anonymous statistic when starting application.
Downgraded to commons-logging 1.0.4 to prevent strange problems when starting the server for the second time.
Commercial only, no free more anymore.
Overlay popups now work in Firefox, Safari, Opera and Internet Explorer.
Removed overlay popups on PSP and fixed login/password field visible lengths.
Fixed database pool leak.
commons-pool-1.4
Several JMX options added.
Do not add a watch folder for scanning if the same folder is already contained in the scanned folders set.
EAP license key valid until 2008-08-31 now.
Clickable links for "albums", "artists" and "genres" in database statistics on portal page.
User selectable start page for alphabet pager (0-9, A-C, all) in web settings.
Added options for "0/2", "0/3", "0/6" and "0/12" to the hour setting of a database schedule.
Fix for database migration to EAP-16 (this time really).
Fix for database migration to EAP-16.
Support for tomcat proxy host and tomcat proxy port (http and https connectors).
Do not send a submission for one track multiple times in a row to last.fm.

Import original artist into database (track table) so we have it even if some words are dropped from the name. This original name is used for last.fm scrobbling and for display purposes on the track info and in playlists and RSS feeds.
Disable anonymous statistics sender after 3 failures in a row.
Force all links to playTrack, downloadTrack, getZipArchive, showTrackImage and upload to be non-SSL.
Display message while removing tracks from database during update.
Anonymous usage statistics after database update.
Display scan count and items per second for database updates (iTunes, folder, cover images).
Correctly URL encode the space character (%20) in the auth token.
Catch all exception when generating path info encryption key.
Remote-API: PlaylistService and EditPlaylistService
Added "-r" option to default lame command line to make it work on Windows as well.
Correct content type and no content length for RSS enclosures when file is being transcoded.
For more than 5 tracks in a section create a section playlist or use an existing one.
Added database index for track.image_hash to speed up removal of orphaned images a lot.
New playlist link replaced with edit existing playlist link when editable MyTunesRSS playlists exist. Dialog with selection of playlist to edit and option to create a new playlist.
Database statistics in JMX console (database config mbean)
Info link in JW media player opens a new window/tab.
Additional contexts can be configured for Tomcat.
JSON-RPC sample application.
User option to enable/disable (default is enabled) URL encryption.
Performance improvement for track info page with MP3 bit rate and sample rate.
Fixed bug when unregistering users from JMX server.
Images with same hash value only inserted once into database. Images linked to tracks via their hash instead of the track id.
Use LogStreamCopyThread for transcoder error streams instead of writing to a file which was not thread safe.
codewave-utils 0.40
Log level setting for codewave log (de.codewave): OFF, FATAL, ERROR, WARN, INFO, DEBUG.
If getting canonical file path for iTunes XML files fails, use the absolute path and Icu4j to normalize it.
Album and artist name were always "unknown" for anything but MP3 and MP4.
JMX object name for users quoted.
Playlist display in iPhone playlist mode. Playlist with pager and links for starting any track.
New version 0.39 of codewave-utils.
Some HTTPS changes.
New playlist type "iPhone" which makes the iPhone or iPod Touch play the playlist in the Quicktime plugin.
HTTPS support.
All track action links on track info page.
Disable yahoo media player checkbox on settings page if download is disabled.
Yahoo media player preview links in browse_track.jsp only if yahoo player and download are enabled.
Fix for yahoo media player image request in BrowseTrackCommandHandler.
Track images and track title for yahoo media player.
More links in the web interface (artist, album, etc.)
Confirmation before deleting mytunesrss playlists in the web interface.
Bugfix for splitted playlists.
Icu4j library.
Normalize track name, album, artist and comment before inserting into database.
Fixed wide theme.
Send anonymous usage information.
Removed duplicate file suffix for flash player.
More request debug logging.
Apple Touch Icon in web application.
Ignore TPA/TPOS if value is illegal, i.e. not a number.
Last.fm music social network support.
TrackService.getDownloadUrl remote API function. TrackService.getPlaybackUrl remote API function.
crossdomain.xml which allows all domains.

Session handling for remote API calls. The LoginService.login function now returns a session ID which can be used in the path info of subsequent calls to identify the session. The LoginService.login call also gets a desired session timeout in seconds.
camel-0.9.7.
Log entry for each file being processed by the file processor.
Bugfix for files which are neither MP3 nor MP4 when scanning watch folders.
codewave-utils-0.37 to hopefully fix playback on iPhone/iPod Touch by adding response headers for range requests.
Fix for Yahoo Media Player requesting stupid image.
Fixed codewave log level setting after loading configuration. Set default log level (until config is loaded) from info to debug.
Create an empty settings file when none is available.

Moved from system properties to settings.xml: - Database configuration -> database/type,driver,connection,user,password - webapp.context -> tomcat/webapp-context - track.comment.id3v2 -> id3v2-track-comment - Jmx -> jmx/port,host,user,password - tomcat.maxThreads -> tomcat/max-threads - ajp.port -> tomcat/ajp-port
Create settings.xml backup before saving a new version.
EAP license.
Use generic version number in welcome message.
Support for multi disc albums (disc number, disc count from iTunesXml, TPA, TPOS from ID3 tags. Sort order of tracks according to disc number and track number.
Yahoo media player for individual tracks in playlist edit mode.
New user permissions "create playlists" and "edit web settings"
Tooltip javascript was buggy.
JW Media Player 3.15
Database updates based on quartz cron expression triggers no matter whether or not the server is running.
Quartz scheduler.
Optional database updates every X seconds while server is running.
All settings stored in an XML file in the settings directory. No remaining usage of java.util.prefs API, so no registry usage on Windows anymore.
Event driven GUI enabling/disabling for all tabs.
Tooltip javascript was buggy.
Event driven GUI enabling/disabling for database, directories.
Display comments on track info page with correct line breaks.
Improved cover art tooltip.
Performance improvement when scanning watch folders since cover art is scanned in the same run, i.e. files are parsed only once.
New version of camel.
Support for all ID3 tags in comments that are supported by camel.
Support for single frame or multiple frame usage for ID3 tag comments.
Support for default values in ID3v2 tag comment descriptions in the system property "track.comment.id3v2".
ID3v2 tag comments: use empty string instead of the word "null" for missing or empty fields.
commons-io 1.4 used.
Writing transcoder log error output log files in debug mode.
New version of codewave-utils.
Fixed transcoding issues.
Ignore cover artfrom in files option added to JMX console.
New version of codewave-utils.
Fixed some bugs in JSPs which resulted in invalid HTML. This fixes a display problem in Internet Explorer (missing track names).
New version of camel.
Compare lower case suffix to check for MP3 files when using Yahoo Media Player.
Use system property "tomcat.maxThreads" for the maximum threads of the HTTP connector. Default is 200 threads.
Debug logging option in JMX console and persistent.
Support request via JMX console.
Catalina base paths with special characters should work now.
Fixed NullPointerException when saving user without selected restriction playlist ID. Catch all Exceptions when trying to register MyTunesRSS.
Yahoo media player integration in browse track page.
Navigating through folders was not possible when selecting transcoding binaries.
Watch folders included by other watch folders removed before database update.
Could not create playliats with a MySQL database.
Nice database update messages from Swing GUI used in JMX GUI as well.
New version of codewave utils.
Do not create java.io.File instances when parsing iTunes XML but only use the path string.
Option to not read cover artwork from MP3 and MP4 files.
Disable the database options while updating the database.
Remove orphaned images from database after update.
Bugfix in "most played tracks" sql for H2.
First release with changes.xml file.
